nodes.text: What is it that you wish to say?
Since we just had a midterm, does this mean that we're halfway to the end of the school year?

You are correct. There are only 21 more days of classes left to this semester. You have a limited time to polish your skills and apply your lessons. I suggest you make the most of your time at the school.

options.text: Ask Why the School is Here

nodes.text: Why did you make a school here in this ruined castle on the outskirts of Caligari? It's seems kind of out of the way to attract a lot of students.

There are many reasons why we brought the school here. One reason is that Luminar Castle was built by true heroes to attract more heroes. It is a most appropriate setting for a school devoted to teaching heroism.
And another reason?
The world needs heroes. This place, more than others.
I just wanted to say that I'm sorry that I smarted off to you in class. I opened my mouth before I used my brain.
You did poorly on the midterm exam. You were insolent in the classroom. Why should I waste further time dealing with you?
I like being here at the school. I am enjoying your lessons and I really am learning a lot, even if I don't always show it. Please, give me another chance and I'll try to do better.
If I do not see a great improvement in your attitude or grades, you will leave this place. You determine your own fate, Herr O'Conner, by your actions.

I've learned a lot from you and your teachings. I really believe that I can make something of myself and the world around me. It's just sometimes, I feel like I'm fighting myself and doing things I know are wrong.
Life isn't easy, Herr O'Conner, nor is it as forgiving as I am. Your mistakes and misjudgments will haunt you for the rest of your life. Do not destroy your future by angering me again.
Yes, sir.
Because I'm charming and witty and wise? Okay, so maybe I'm not alway so wise. But you got to admit, this class would be a lot duller without me.
You have a great deal of nerve, Herr O'Conner. You are testing the limits of my patience. If I lose my patience with you once more, you will be out of here.

I'm sorry I smarted off to you, sir. I'm not proud of my score on the test - I should have done better. It's just that there is so much going on in my life right now. I guess I let my frustrations get the better of me.
If you let you frustrations again overweigh your commonsense in my classroom, there will be no Hero University in your future. Is that clear?
Yes, sir.
I'm sorry I didn't kowtow to your teachings more and learn how to say the words you want me to say. I'm just terrible at kissing butts, sir. I clearly need to practice my bootlicking skills.
If you are deliberately going out of your way to provoke me, then you have succeeded. You have crossed the line between roguishly amusing and blatantly insolent.
Look - I was forced to come to this school against my will. I don't fit in here. I can't walk out the front door. It's a prison.
If you think this school is a prison, then you had better be very careful with your actions in the future or else you will learn what a prison is really like.
Go, Shawn. You have your freedom now. Make of it what you will.

Shawn was forced to go to school
But Shawn refused to learn the rule
When life gets rough - don't whine and shout
Sometimes you're better in than out.
Good day, sir.
Watch yourself... and be careful.
